GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
NFSv4.2 fix problems with __nfs42_ssc_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 5626f95356111602ad26fc05445a4d1f818a0992, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit ec4b0925089826af45e99cdf78a8ac84c1d005f1. For more details please see the references link.
